domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
A Heroes Fund for essential workers should be a part of the next phase of the Congressional response to coronavirus.

No proposal will be complete without addressing the needs of our doctors, nurses, medical workers, truck drivers, grocers, transit workers, and more.

Our Heroes.
